alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 9:49PM EDT until June 03 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level along shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Beaufort, Coastal Jasper, and coastal southeast Georgia. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides will continue to fall now that high tide has occurred. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Fort Pulaski GA MLLW Categories - Minor 9.5 ft, Moderate 10.0 ft, Major 10.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/09 PM 9.8 2.3 1.6 N/A Minor 04/09 AM 8.4 0.9 1.8 N/A None 04/09 PM 10.1 2.6 1.8 N/A Moderate 05/10 AM 8.5 1.0 1.8 N/A None 05/10 PM 9.9 2.4 1.7 N/A Minor 06/10 AM 8.3 0.8 1.7 N/A None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Visit water.weather.gov for additional water level and flood impact information.
